snippet: The confirmation of the strikes adds a new level of complexity to the United States’ struggle to craft a coherent strategy to fight the Islamic State.
abstract: Turkey confirms that it hit positions in Syria held by Kurdish military over past year; confirmation adds stress to United States' efforts to combat Islamic State in Syria, as Kurds are US allies.

keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
keywords.name: organizations

lead_paragraph: The confirmation of the strikes adds a new level of complexity to the United States’ struggle to craft a coherent strategy to fight the Islamic State.

headline.print_headline: Turkey Says It Hit Kurdish Militias in Cross-Border Raids
headline.main: Turkey Confirms Strikes Against Kurdish Militias in Syria
